member.name: P:BannedApiAnalyzer.ApiDesignRules.ApiDesignResources.DuplicateBannedSymbolDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The list of banned symbols contains a duplicate..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The symbol '{0}' is listed multiple times in the list of banned APIs.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The list of banned symbols contains a duplicate.

member.name: P:BannedApiAnalyzer.ApiDesignRules.ApiDesignResources.SymbolIsBannedMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The symbol '{0}' is banned in this project{1}.

member.name: P:BannedApiAnalyzer.ApiDesignRules.ApiDesignResources.SymbolIsBannedTitle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Do not used banned APIs.

member.name: T:BannedApiAnalyzer.NoCodeFixAttribute
member.summary: This attribute is applied to s for which no code fix is currently planned.

remarks.para: There are several reasons an analyzer does not have a code fix, including but not limited to the following:

item.description: Visual Studio provides a built-in code fix.
A code fix could not provide a useful solution.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The reason why the does not have a code fix.
